TtForm.Name: CRS Base Transition Form
TtForm.InvalidFieldText: One or more fields are invalid.
TtForm.RequiredFieldText: '{0}' is a required field. Please supply a valid value to complete this transition.
TtForm.SSOPreviewText: Preview only supports SSO authentication if you are logged in to the repository. In the User Workspace, customers will see the Web page located at: {0}
TtForm.SSONoTokenText: Unable to retrieve a valid Security Token for request to: {0}.
TtForm.PDFMissingText: Download Adobe Acrobat Reader in order to view this PDF.
TtForm.ReportPreviewText: Preview does not support embedded reports. In the User Workspace, customers will see the report located at: {0}
TtForm.WeCouldNotLocateErrorText: We could not locate all of the data needed to perform your request.
TtForm.YouMayNotHavePermissionsErrorText: You may not have permission to access these fields.
TtForm.WeDidNotFindAnyMatchesErrorText: REST service call failed. Check the authentication settings of the endpoint used by this REST grid in Application Repository.
TtForm.PleaseTryRestrictingTheDataErrorText: Please try restricting the data returned by adjusting the input parameters.
TtForm.AuthorizationFailedErrorText: Authorization failed - check the Screen Name and Password
TtForm.StatusPostErrorText: An error occured posting the status update
TtForm.TheRestGridIsNotConfigured: The REST Grid is not configured:

TtLabel.name: Title/Summary
TtLabel.Description: High-level summary of the change being requested, expressed clearly enough for non-technical staff to comprehend

TtLabel.name: Description
TtLabel.Description: Detailed description of the change being requested, specifying affected components/subsystems, and to what degree items will be changed

TtLabel.name: Justification
TtLabel.Description: Justification for requesting the change and consequences of not performing it

TtLabel.name: Tag/Label
TtLabel.Description: Optional categorical words to be applied to the CR record, for later use by the product team

TtLabel.name: SDD Application
TtLabel.Description: Selection of SDD application being changed

TtLabel.name: SDD Application Module(s)
TtLabel.Description: An optional subcomponent of the SDD Application, if so used by the product team

TtLabel.name: Branch/PMO
TtLabel.Description: SDD Branch/PMO managing the application

TtLabel.name: Issue Type
TtLabel.Description: Selection of issue type that made the change request necessary (Defect/SIR, SCR-T, or SCR-F)

TtLabel.name: Change Type
TtLabel.Description: Selection of approach requested to accomplish the change (Change code or the DB schema, Data Table Update, Change to Configuration)

TtLabel.name: Priority
TtLabel.Description: The product team's rating of its urgency to accomplish the change (1 = High, 5= Low)

TtLabel.name: Severity
TtLabel.Description: The degree of impact on the product or system if the requested change is not made ( 1=Emergency, 2= Urgent, 3= High, 4= Routine, 5=Minor)

TtLabel.name: Version Found in
TtLabel.Description: Version number of the SDD Application in which the issue/defect was discovered

TtLabel.name: Version Fixed In
TtLabel.Description: Planned version number of the SDD application in which the issue/defect will be fixed

TtLabel.name: Story Points
TtLabel.Description: Rate of effort of work in a Fibonacci numerical sequence to be used by Product Team at their discretion.

TtLabel.name: Process Deviation
TtLabel.Description: Used only by CM Team to document deviations from the standard process

TtLabel.name: CM Team Acceptance
TtLabel.Description: Used only by CM Team to mark a Change Request as ready for the Government to review and decide whether the vendor may being work

TtLabel.name: RM Team Acceptance
TtLabel.Description: Used only by RM Team to signify a CR's requirements are properly identified

TtLabel.name: Related Tracking System
TtLabel.Description: Selection of a listed tracking system in which the CR originated, if applicable

TtLabel.name: Related Tracking Number
TtLabel.Description: Tracking system's specific ticket number for the CR, if applicable

TtLabel.name: Date of Gov't Approval
TtLabel.Description: Auto populated based on exact date Gov't approved the CR

TtLabel.name: Date of Deployment
TtLabel.Description: Auto populated based on CP Planned or targeted date for deployment of the change described in the Change Request

TtLabel.name: Discretionary
TtLabel.Description: Indication that the effort is discretionary or if it is mandatory, based on SDD guidance

TtLabel.name: Release Qualification
TtLabel.Description: Degree of impact on the SDD Application's baseline if the if the change described in the CR were to be implemented by itself

TtLabel.name: Requirements Number
TtLabel.Description: Reference number from the related requirements tracking system

TtLabel.name: Requirement Statement/User Story
TtLabel.Description: The applicable requirement statement or user story addressed by the CR

TtLabel.name: Acceptance Criteria
TtLabel.Description: Any specific test or evaluation to be followed in confirming the success of the change

TtLabel.name: T&E Notification Memo
TtLabel.Description: Boilerplate text to be used in generating test results for this CR

TtLabel.name: T&E Notification Number
TtLabel.Description: A number to be assigned to the test effort for this CR

TtLabel.name: Project Manager (GOV)
TtLabel.Description: Project Officer

TtLabel.name: ISSM
TtLabel.Description: Cyber Security Engineer

TtLabel.name: ISSO
TtLabel.Description: (IA Analyst)

TtLabel.name: Program Manager
TtLabel.Description: Program Manager

TtLabel.name: System Engineer (GOV)
Self Service Request
TtLabel.Description: Set to "Yes" when the CR is submitted by the affected user.

TtLabel.name: Request Form
TtLabel.Description: Internal field used to track the custom submit form that was used to submit the request.

TtLabel.name: Affected User
TtLabel.Description: The user directly affected by the request.

TtLabel.name: CR State
TtLabel.Description: An internal field used to route the request to the correct state.

StaticText.name: ClearSectionsConfirmationText
StaticText.Text: Are you sure that you want to delete the contents in all of your sections?
